document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the Anthribidae (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea) of Panama, including new country records and a key to genera

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the Anthribidae (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea) of Panama, including new country records and a key to genera

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Macrocephalus nebulosus
Olivier, 1795: 5
.
Type locality:
[ French Guiana ]: Cayenne ( type material in MNHN).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ptychoderes elongatus Lacordaire, 1830: 158
.
Type locality:
Brazil ( type material in MNHN?).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ptychoderes tricostrifrons Fahraeus in Schoenherr, 1839
;
Wolfrum, 1929: 6
(catalog);
Valentine, 1957: 2
.
Type locality:
Mexico ( type material in NHRS).

Ptychoderes columbianus
Jekel, 1855: 50
.
Type locality:
Colombia : Bogotá , Carthagena and Brazil , Amazona , Pará , not designated ( type material in MNHN).
